--0-1532552752-1098130483=:66805
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

OOC:  The interior is as follows: the control area at the front of the ship is about the size of a bedroom.  There is a hall passing two rooms of bedroom size, and actual bedroom and storage room.  At the end of the hall there is another average sized room, that is the engine and power area, the back wall is all intruments and access panels.  
 
Hellplague:
 
The Sweep commander followed after Celeron, mostly to make sure he was doing what he was supposed to.  Also to keep from going to sleep, lest he escape.

Alex Sell <kraftlos@...> wrote:
Celeron managed to get enough parts together to make a replacement
interface card, he got halfway through making another card when he ran
out of parts.  He decided to get to work on the network hub and leave
the for later.  The hub had not been damaged severely and most of it
was repaired by simple rewiring, but he still needed more parts.  So
he went out of the room and this time started exploring further into
the ship than he had before.....

OOC: How big is this ship?
